## IHttpInterceptController interface

Used to halt a request Promise chain in a [HttpInterceptor](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.httpinterceptor.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IHttpInterceptController 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [halted](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.ihttpinterceptcontroller.halted.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Whether or not this chain has been halted. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [halt()](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.ihttpinterceptcontroller.halt.md) | Halt the request Promise chain and do not process further interceptors or response handlers. |
